title: [build] Have PyTorch depend on minimal libcaffe2.so instead of libATen.so
body_html:
• ATen will be included as a part of Caffe2 with this pull request
  • This will let us share code between Caffe2 and ATen for operator library work

Tested with

python setup.py build_deps
python setup.py develop
cd test && python run_test.py

as well as

tools/cpp_build/build_all.sh

cc @ezyang, @pjh5, @Yangqing for review once I figure out the test failure.

body:
* ATen will be included as a part of Caffe2 with this pull request
* This will let us share code between Caffe2 and ATen for operator library work

Tested with

```
python setup.py build_deps
python setup.py develop
cd test && python run_test.py
```
as well as

```
tools/cpp_build/build_all.sh
```

cc @ezyang, @pjh5, @Yangqing for review once I figure out the test failure.
